title: The life and death of Major Clancie, the grandest cheat of this age wherein is set forth many of his villanous projects (real matter of fact) both in England, Ireland, France, Spain and Italy, at last was executed at Tyburn : the reading of which will give the reader great satisfaction.
author: Settle, Elkanah, 1648-1724.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by D. Mallet and are to be sold at his house ...,
